name: Laser Queen Vs Penguins
description:
Laser Queen vs Penguins is a game where you play as a Queen that shoots lasers from her eyes, with the goal being to stop penguins from flying!

Instructions for download:

1. Download the zip file

2. Unzip the file

3. Open the exe

some of the assets I used -
Music - https://tallbeard.itch.io/music-loop-bundle

Penguin - https://www.cgtrader.com/free-3d-models/animals/bird/penguin-c4287db7-3098-4fca-...

Queen - https://free-game-assets.itch.io/free-medieval-3d-people-low-poly-pack
